mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(M_ID, M_PASSWORD, M_NAME, M_PHONE, M_REGION1, M_REGION2, M_REGION3, M_DOG, M_SIZE, M_COLOR, M_GENDER) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{region1}, #{region2}, #{region3}, #{dog}, #{size}, #{color}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT M_ID, M_PASSWORD, M_NAME, M_PHONE, M_REGION1, M_REGION2, M_REGION3, M_DOG, M_SIZE, M_COLOR, M_GENDER FROM MEMBER
